Moo::IndicesHolder

Moo::IndicesHolder Class Reference

A class to hold the actual index data which can be updated and used to upload into a D3D resource via the IndexBuffer class below. More...

#include <index_buffer.hpp>

Detailed Description

A class to hold the actual index data which can be updated and used to upload into a D3D resource via the IndexBuffer class below.
